title: Add unit test target and initial test coverage
description: No test target exists in project.yml. Need to: 1) Add NetmonitorTests target to XcodeGen project.yml 2) Create initial test files 3) Wire up scheme for test action 4) Add baseline tests for core services (NetworkMonitorService, PingService, DNSLookupService)
close_reason: Test target added to project.yml, 4 test suites with 8 tests all passing: PingServiceTests (3), WakeOnLANServiceTests (3), DNSLookupServiceTests (1), NetworkMonitorServiceTests (1)

title: Unify MetricRow and ToolResultRow components
description: P2 polish from v1.0 plan. MetricRow and ToolResultRow may have overlapping functionality. Consolidate into a single reusable component.
close_reason: False positive: MetricRow never existed, ToolResultRow already unified

title: Consolidate ResumeState implementations
description: P2 architecture from v1.0 plan. Multiple services may have their own resume-safety patterns. Consolidate into the shared ConcurrencyHelpers.ResumeState actor.

title: Verify and fix TracerouteService TCP approach
description: P0 bug from v1.0 production plan. TracerouteService uses TCP-based approach due to iOS ICMP limitations. Verify it works correctly and produces reasonable hop results.
close_reason: Fixed fd leak on inet_pton failure and RTT calculation precision (seconds+attoseconds)

title: Add data export functionality (JSON/CSV)
description: PRD Section 3.6 requires data export in JSON and CSV formats. Should export tool results, speed test history, and device data from SwiftData.

title: Verify and fix PingService packet loss calculation
description: P0 bug from v1.0 production plan. PingService calculateStatistics may have incorrect packet loss calculation. Verify with unit tests.
close_reason: Fixed stop() to directly set isRunning instead of spawning detached Task. calculateStatistics was correct.

title: Expand Settings screen with full PRD sections
description: PRD specifies: monitoring settings (auto-refresh interval, background refresh), notification settings (target down, high latency, new device alerts), appearance (theme system/light/dark, accent color), about section (version, acknowledgements, support link, rate app). Current settings screen is basic.
close_reason: Added Monitoring, Notification, Appearance sections + enhanced About with acknowledgements/support/rate

title: Fix latency badge color thresholds
description: P2 polish from v1.0 plan. Latency badges should use green/yellow/red thresholds consistently across dashboard and tools.
close_reason: Fixed PingToolView timeColor to use Theme.Colors.latencyColor(ms:) canonical thresholds

title: Replace magic numbers with Theme constants
description: P2 polish from v1.0 plan. Hardcoded spacing/sizing values should use Theme.Layout constants for consistency.
close_reason: Replaced magic numbers across 6 view files with Theme.Layout constants

title: Make BonjourDiscoveryService reactive instead of polling
description: P2 architecture from v1.0 plan. BonjourDiscoveryToolVM may poll the service. Convert to reactive pattern using AsyncStream or observation.

title: Add service injection for testability
description: P2 architecture from v1.0 plan. Tool ViewModels should accept services via protocol-based injection for unit testing.

title: Fix unstable UUIDs in ToolStatistic and ToolItem
description: P2 polish from v1.0 plan. ToolStatistic and ToolItem may create new UUIDs on each render, causing unnecessary SwiftUI view updates.
close_reason: False positive: both ToolStatistic and ToolItem use stable computed IDs from name/label

title: Standardize error handling with NetworkError enum
description: P2 architecture from v1.0 plan. Services should use a consistent NetworkError enum instead of ad-hoc error strings.

title: Fix ToolRunButton dead code
description: P2 polish from v1.0 plan. ToolRunButton may contain unused code paths. Audit and clean up.
close_reason: Audit complete: no dead code found, component is clean at 55 lines

title: Verify and fix BonjourDiscoveryService double-resume crash
description: P0 bug from v1.0 production plan. BonjourDiscoveryService may crash from double-resume of continuations. ResumeState actor exists but verify it's properly used.
close_reason: Fixed browser lifecycle: stored typeBrowsers in property array, proper cleanup in stopDiscovery()

title: Fix PortRange/PortScanPreset duplication
description: P2 architecture from v1.0 plan. PortRange and PortScanPreset may have duplicated port definitions. Consolidate.

title: Add clear cached data option in Settings
description: PRD Section 3.6 requires ability to clear cached data from Settings. Should clear SwiftData stores and any file caches.

title: Verify and fix DNS A-query returning AAAA records
description: P0 bug from v1.0 production plan. DNSLookupService A record queries may incorrectly return AAAA records. Verify filtering logic.
close_reason: Fixed hints.ai_family to use AF_INET/AF_INET6 instead of AF_UNSPEC
